markdown:
<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Standard">[Scroll Trickster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=74)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 189 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

Magic has long been written down, and in myriad forms. From the classic rolled parchment to strings tied with a hundred intricate knots, from baked clay tablets covered with incisions to bound collections of bamboo slips, magic is everywhere. You just need to know how to read it.

<document level="2" id="feat-2053" />

name: Scroll Trickster
prerequisite: Trained in Arcana, Trained in Nature, Trained in Occultism, or Trained in Religion
